)

### Exercise 3:

Find the top 5 songs in Hong Kong.

In the slides we discussed the `==` operator. Here is a longer list of some options!

| operator | meaning |
| -------- | ------- |
| `==`     | is equal to |
| `<`      | is less than |
| `>`      | is greater than |


```{python}
(music_top200
  >> filter(___, ___)
)
```

```{python tags=c("solution-code")}
(music_top200
  >> filter(_.country == "Hong Kong", _.position < 6)
)
```
